name: A collaborative CGT policy
tagline: What the plan to exempt investors in startups CGT may look like
body:
### Let's create a policy together. 
This repo was created in response to [Steve Baxter's post](https://www.facebook.com/RiverCityLabs/posts/1099337146751124) on River City Labs' Facebook page. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
